recommendations: Ashish Raut ‚ÄúDhiraj posses great knowledge in field of data science and Artificial intelligence. He always try to learn and teach his skills to his mates in any form. Also he's very good communicator towards business point of view.‚Äù

Sanket Patil ‚ÄúI highly recommend Dhiraj Wagh, my colleague at Agivant Technologies, for any data science or artificial intelligence role. Dhiraj's expertise in leveraging large language models (LLM) and computer vision (CV) systems, coupled with his proficiency in Python and key libraries like Sklearn and TensorFlow, make him a valuable asset. Dhiraj consistently demonstrates excellence in his work and is a reliable team player. I am confident that he will excel in any role he takes on and make significant contributions to your team.‚Äù

projects: [{"title":"Ultimate smart intelligent Drone","start_date":"Aug 2019","end_date":"Present","description":"*Collaborated with a team of six performs ultimate smart intelligent Drone using Internet of Things (IoT), Machine learning and deep learning technology.*Drone performs various tasks like obstacle Avoiding, human detection in mountain area, red ball detection, avoiding peoples & trees (if they are to close).* Implementation of Basic Drone Feature like GPS Waypoint Navigation, Live Stream Video FPV, Altitude Hold, Position Hold, Return to Home, etc*work on microcontrollers like Arduino boards, Raspberry Pi & BeagleBone Black and works with high-performance Sitara processor evaluation module developed by texas instrument. works on pixhawk flight controller and obstacle avoiding sensors.* familiar with Real-Time Operating system (RTOS) operating systems, python library - OpenCV, GPIO, Numpy, etc"},{},{},{},{},{},{"title":"Eligible Candidate Selection Project","start_date":"May 2020","end_date":"Jul 2020","description":"A data is provided to us was From different cities of Maharashtra students and their Details Who Applied For the Internship Program Created By the Cloud Counselage Pvt.Ltd, So we Developed an ML model which Classifies the Eligible and Criteria Fit candidate, And helps Organization to Select the Accurate Candidate for The Internship Program."},{"title":"Stock Prediction with LSTM Recurrent Neural Network using Python","start_date":"Aug 2019","end_date":"Sep 2019","description":"‚Ä¢Collaborated with a team of two to perform Stock Prediction using LSTM Recurrent Neural Network based on various parameters.‚Ä¢Performed various tasks like Data cleaning, Exploratory data analysis and Data modeling for predictions of Stock prices.‚Ä¢ Python Libraries used Pandas, Numpy, Matplotlib, Keras."},{},{"title":"Using of CNN Model for facial emotion detection ( Using Python )","start_date":"Jul 2019","end_date":"Aug 2019","description":"‚Ä¢Collaborated with a team of two to perform Using of CNN Model for facial emotion detection ( Using Python ) based on various parameters.‚Ä¢Performed various tasks like Training and test dataset Using CNN models, Detection of Facial Expression Using Trained Models‚Ä¢ Python Libraries used Pandas, Tensorflow, OpenCV, Keras."},{},{"title":"Fake News Classifier Project","description":"Reading the News Improves knowledge, but sometimes Some Kind of News's are Fake and Created to Mislead people, So we Developed the ML NLP model Based on The Dataset having News along with the globe, which Classifies the Fake News and Real News and tells Whether the news is Fake or Real, Which can prevent from spreading rumours among people's"}]
